<The Shire of Isis

Text: Shire of Isis:  The Shire, administered from the town of Childers covered an area of 1702.2 km2 , and existed as a local government entity from 1887 until 2008, when it was amalgamated with the City of Bundaberg and the Shires of Burnett and Kolan to form the Bundaberg Region.
